Class JUnitTestingBase

java.lang.Object
education.the_software_toolsmith.testing.framework.TestingBase
education.the_software_toolsmith.testing.framework.JUnitTestingBase
@DisplayName("JUnit Testing Base") @TestInstance(PER_CLASS) public class JUnitTestingBase extends TestingBase
Base class for JUnit testing
Version:
1.0 2018-05-25 initial set of tests
, 1.1 2018-06-09 revise structure to use TestInfo instead of certain hard-coded text, 1.2 2018-09-02 add timeouts, 1.3 2019-01-14 more implementation, 1.3.1 2019-01-17 cosmetic changes, 2.0 2019-05-12
  • restructure tests
  • disable System.exit() during testing
  • start making each subtest independent so they'll all run even if one fails
, 2.1 2019-05-17
  • rename class
  • remove unnecessary throws clauses from @BeforeXxx and @AfterXxx
  • more fully utilize JUnit 5.4 features
  • switch tests to data-driven
, 3.0 2019-06-27
  • complete re-write with reusable testing infrastructure
  • tests are now data-driven
  • add summary test results
, 3.1 2019-06-28 move detailed activity to log file, 4.0 2019-07-04 split general purpose utilities methods into separate class, 5.0 2019-10-07 revise for Stack ADT, 5.1 2020-01-26 cleanup toward DRCo coding standard compliance, 5.2 2020-05-14
  • cleanup comments
  • enhance null argument handling
  • in parseArguments(): correct numeric range bounds parsing; add support for data-supplied step, repeating group count, duplicate count
  • output formatting adjustments to improve alignment and readability
  • add PlaceholderException to support specific Exception detection
  • add support for detection and display of boolean/Boolean and char/Character types
, 5.3 2020-06-03 add startTest() pass-through for backward compatibility, 5.4 2020-07-22
  • add instance field retrieval and modification methods
  • add method invocation support
, 5.5 2020-08-07
  • consolidate/simplify field access methods
  • add collection retrieval methods
, 6.0 2020-09-13 Split into general unit testing support and JUnit-specific support - this class implements the former., 6.0.1 2021-06-19
  • reflect move of other classes from ...testing.junit package to ...testing package
  • switch to fully object-oriented (eliminate static variables)
  • move per-class setup to TestingBase constructor
, 6.1 2021-06-21 overload TestingBase's startTest methods to handle first argument (TestInfo testInfo for backward compatibility, 6.2 2021-11-18 enhance stub behavior determination, 6.3 2023-10-19 switch direct access to SecurityManager, which is deprecated as of Java 17, to use utility methods in TestingBase, 7.0 2025-07-18
  • swap operands to '==' and '!=' when comparing against a constant so the constant is the left operand
  • rename xxxEachTest() to xxxTest() for greater consistency with class methods
  • keep xxxEachTest() as deprecated, temporary pass-throughs
, 7.0.1 2025-07-29 remove deprecated methods - they were executing twice
Author:
David M Rosenberg

    • startTest

      protected Object[][] startTest(org.junit.jupiter.api.TestInfo testInfo, boolean isLastTest, boolean isStubBehavior, String... collectionContentsArguments)
      Utility to pre-process test parameters - pass-through to method that takes argument labels - for backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      testInfo - info about the test - ignored
      isLastTest - flag to indicate that this is the last dataset for this test
      isStubBehavior - flag to indicate that the result of testing this dataset matches the stubbed behavior
      collectionContentsArguments - contents of one or more collections to populate
      Returns:
      the parsed collectionContentsArguments in order of appearance in the argument list

    • startTest

      protected Object[][] startTest(org.junit.jupiter.api.TestInfo testInfo, boolean isLastTest, boolean isStubBehavior, String[] argumentLabels, String... collectionContentsArguments)
      Utility to pre-process test parameters
      Parameters:
      testInfo - info about the test - ignored
      isLastTest - flag to indicate that this is the last dataset for this test
      isStubBehavior - flag to indicate that the result of testing this dataset matches the stubbed behavior
      argumentLabels - descriptive text for each of the collectionContentArguments elements
      collectionContentsArguments - contents of one or more collections to populate
      Returns:
      the parsed collectionContentsArguments in order of appearance in the argument list
